title: Zyxel security advisory (AV26-167)
description: On February 24, 2026, Zyxel published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: 4G LTE/5G NR CPE  multiple models and versions
DSL/Ethernet CPE  multiple models and versions
Fiber ONTs  multiple models and versions
Security Routers  multiple models and versions
Wireless Extenders  multiple models and versions
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
